channel.title: Source- hybridscape- error
channel.description:
Ok well its not a compiling error.. its every time i try to log in.. this error started after i added npc drops.. [code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at client.loadGame(client.java:5239) at client.run(client.java:557) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [client-2-xstrxpurez]: xstrxpurez is already online. Did not save for xstrxpurez [client-2-xstrxpurez]: xstrxpurez is already online. Did not save for xstrxpurez [client-2-xstrxpurez]: xstrxpurez is already online. Did not save for xstrxpurez [/code]
i checked the 5239 line.. and the 557 line.. and the 619 line... but i didnt change any of that... and its like starting to piss me off... because it use to let me log in.. then i added the file called npcdrops.cfg ... and then got this error.. i removed the file and it still did it.. so i have no damn clue whats wrong with it.. can some1 help?

item.title: Source- hybridscape- error
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

Ok well its not a compiling error… its every time i try to log in… this error started after i added npc drops…

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at client.loadGame(client.java:5239) at client.run(client.java:557) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [client-2-xstrxpurez]: xstrxpurez is already online. Did not save for xstrxpurez [client-2-xstrxpurez]: xstrxpurez is already online. Did not save for xstrxpurez [client-2-xstrxpurez]: xstrxpurez is already online. Did not save for xstrxpurez

i checked the 5239 line… and the 557 line… and the 619 line… but i didnt change any of that… and its like starting to piss me off… because it use to let me log in… then i added the file called npcdrops.cfg … and then got this error… i removed the file and it still did it… so i have no damn clue whats wrong with it… can some1 help?
